price: Enti wodeε bᴐ wo Wura Nyankopͻn abodin na kamfo no, na ka wͻn a wͻde wͻn anim butu fͻm no ho.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
